about.title: About us
about.github: Find more information about the developers and this project on our
about.message: We are a group of students at the University of Oviedo, learning the ropes of agile development on open-source projects using frameworks we've never used.
gameModes.basicQuiz.description: Play a basic quiz game. You will be presented with an image, a question related to the image, and a set of possible answers. Try to choose the correct answer. You can also ask the AI chat for a hint!
gameModes.basicQuiz.name: Normal game
gameModes.custom.description: Play a customizable game. You can choose the number of questions, the time limit, and even the topic of the questions. Give a fresh breath to the game with infinite possible configurations!
gameModes.custom.name: Custom game
gameModes.endlessMarathon.description: Endless mode, no question limit. Keep answering questions until you miss while you climb up in the leaderboard!
gameModes.endlessMarathon.name: Endless marathon
gameModes.expertDomain.description: Play a basic game, but focused on an specific topic. Show your knowledge on your favourite topic, or let the randomized spinning wheel decide for you to make the game more challenging!
gameModes.expertDomain.name: Expert's domain
gameModes.timeAttack.description: In this game mode, the time is the limit. Try to answer as fast as you can and as much questions as possible before the timer goes to 0!
gameModes.timeAttack.name: Time attack
homePage.welcome: Welcome to WiChat game! Select a game mode to start playing:
index.description: WiChat is a trivial-style game where you are given an image, a basic question and four possible answers, and you must select the correct one, with the help of an AI powered chatbot.
index.howItWorks: All questions are generated from Wikidata, the wikipedia information database, and are switched periodically to ensure fresh gameplay every game!
index.title: What is Wichat
login.title: Welcome back!

results.title: Session statistics:
signup.error.passwords.contents: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit, and one special character
signup.error.passwords.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
signup.error.username.contents: Username can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores
signup.title: Welcome!
statistics.noData: No games played yet! Start your first quiz to see your statistics here.
